name: Written With Love
description: You… are a cupid, and you have one job…. a job you are terrifyingly close to losing!!!?? It is your last… your FINAL chance! You are faced with the challenge of getting a country boy and a city girl to fall in love via… LETTERS?? This is a high stakes tale of workplace woe. But, can YOU resist their charm?? Have you ever wanted to win the heart of… a himbo cowboy billionaire?? How about an aloof high power business woman with time management skills in spades?!! Maybe… BOTH?? Test your luck in this cutthroat world of cupids, coffees, and cows.
